```{r}
library(CDM)
library(GDINA) 
library(BIFIEsurvey)
```


```{r}
# Data with additional information 5 
timss.info <- data.timss11.G4.AUT.part$data

# Q-matrix involving combinations between content and cognitive skills 8 
timssq <- data.timss11.G4.AUT.part$q.matrix1
# Response data 11 
timss <- timss.info[,paste(timssq$item)]
```


```{r}
# Model including all students for calibration of item parameters 14 
timss.est <- GDINA::GDINA(timss, timssq[,-1])
```

```{r}
Qv2 <- Qval(timss.est,method = "Wald")
Qv2
```

```{r}
plot(Qv2, item = 9)
```

```{r}
Qv <- Qval(timss.est)
Qv
```

```{r}

plot(Qv, item = 9)

```

```{r}
mc <- modelcomp(timss.est)
mc
```

```{r}
mft <- modelfit(timss.est)
mft
```


```{r}
ift <- itemfit(timss.est)
ift
```


```{r}
summary(ift)
```


```{r}
plot(ift)
```


```{r}
CA(timss.est)
```
